subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Golf
Blacks
lead_paragraph: By the time Mr. Sifford was allowed to compete against the world’s best golfers, he was almost 40. But he won the PGA Tour’s Greater Hartford Open in 1967 and its Los Angeles Open in 1969.
snippet: By the time Mr. Sifford was allowed to compete against the world’s best golfers, he was almost 40. But he won the PGA Tour’s Greater Hartford Open in 1967 and its Los Angeles Open in 1969.
